home.instructions1: Please register and login with your username to begin!

start.instructions1: Press the Begin button to start (or continue)

search.noResults: Your search query matched no results

form.title: Questionnaire
form.instructions: Now you must answer some questions!

modal.nextStageInstructions: Now you can go to the next stage
modal.confirmChanges: Are you sure that you want to continue to next stage?

timeup.title: Time is over!
timeup.instruction: Time is over for this stage. Now you will continue to next stage.

confirm.title: Continue to next stage
confirm.instruction: Are you sure you want to continue? Your answers will be submitted and you not will be able to go back.

hints.neuroneButton: If you get lost, press the NEURONE button to get to the main page of your current task
hints.taskButton: Remember to click the Task button to see your assignment!
hints.tutorialButton: Remember to click the Tutorial button to get help in how to complete your assignment!
hints.tipsButton: Remember to click the Tips button to get some hints for your assignment

tutorial.tryNow: Now it's your time to try

stage0.i1: Write a phrase that you think it will be a good search query!

stage1.i1: Write a phrase to search in the box and click Search
stage1.i2: Pick a page from the results list and click in the title to open it
stage1.i3: While inside a page, click Bookmark to save the page for future reference, or click Unbookmark to remove the page from your bookmark list
stage1.i4: The bookmark list stores your current saved bookmarks
stage1.ex_2c: This is a very relevant web site!

stage2.i1: Click the tabs to load a page from your bookmark list
stage2.i2: Remember to answer the questions for every page!
stage2.i3: Select some text from the page and click the Save Snippet button to save a relevant piece of text
stage2.i4: You can revisit or delete your snippet if you want

stage3.i1: Write your answer in the field below (you can style it!)
stage3.i2: You can visit your snippets by clicking in the tabs
stage3.i3: You can revisit the page where a snippet came from by clicking the snippet
